headline: Ford Reports Record Quarterly Loss
summary: $11.1 billion   That's the loss that Ford Motor posted last quarter, its largest ever, mainly related to charges tied to its electric-vehicle business.   Ford expects to continue to lose money on EVs until 2029.

content.title: Ford Reports Record Quarterly Loss

headline: Ford, Lyft, Kraft Heinz, Hasbro, Mattel: Earnings Roundup
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are rising in Wednesday's pre-market trading after the January jobs report saw the US economy grow by 130,000 non-farm payrolls last month, double the job growth expected by economists. Companies like Ford (F), Lyft (LYFT), Kraft Heinz (KHC), Hasbro (HAS), and Mattel (MAT) also reported their latest earnings results amid all this fresh economic news. Morning Brief Host Julie Hyman dives into the latest earnings results from top companies. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Ford, Lyft, Kraft Heinz, Hasbro, Mattel: Earnings Roundup

US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are rising in Wednesday's pre-market trading after the January jobs report saw the US economy grow by 130,000 non-farm payrolls last month, double the job growth expected by economists. Companies like Ford (F), Lyft (LYFT), Kraft Heinz (KHC), Hasbro (HAS), and Mattel (MAT) also reported their latest earnings results amid all this fresh economic news.

Morning Brief Host Julie Hyman dives into the latest earnings results from top companies.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: F Q4 Deep Dive: Cost Discipline, Product Mix, and EV Shifts Define Results
summary: Automotive manufacturer Ford (NYSE:F) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, but sales fell by 4.8% year on year to $45.89 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.13 per share was 32.9% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: F Q4 Deep Dive: Cost Discipline, Product Mix, and EV Shifts Define Results
content.summary: Automotive manufacturer Ford (NYSE:F) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, but sales fell by 4.8% year on year to $45.89 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.13 per share was 32.9% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Trump Privately Weighs Quitting USMCA Trade Pact He Signed
summary: President Donald Trump is privately musing about exiting the North American trade pact, people familiar with the matter said, injecting further uncertainty about the deal’s future into pivotal renegotiations involving the US, Canada and Mexico.  A White House official, asked about the discussions, described Trump as the ultimate decision-maker and someone always seeking a better deal for the American people.  An official in US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer’s office said that a rubber-stamp of the 2019 terms was not in the national interest and the administration intended to keep Trump’s options open and negotiate to address issues that had been identified.

content.title: Trump Privately Weighs Quitting USMCA Trade Pact He Signed
content.summary: President Donald Trump is privately musing about exiting the North American trade pact, people familiar with the matter said, injecting further uncertainty about the deal’s future into pivotal renegotiations involving the US, Canada and Mexico.  A White House official, asked about the discussions, described Trump as the ultimate decision-maker and someone always seeking a better deal for the American people.  An official in US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer’s office said that a rubber-stamp of the 2019 terms was not in the national interest and the administration intended to keep Trump’s options open and negotiate to address issues that had been identified.
